author: Vexed (Vexed#0714)
description: Beautify and minify JSON. Supports attachments, codeblocks and replies.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
This cog has two commands - `beautify` and `minify`.

**If you would like this cog to support Python dicts as well as normal JSON, please run this command with your prefix ([p]) replaced: `[p]pipinstall pyjson5`. This should work on Linux, but it can error on Windows. It is not required for the cog so don't worry if it does error.**

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/beautify>
name: Beautify
short: Beautify and minify JSON. Supports attachments, codeblocks and replies.
